code_value: Questions 1~2  You have missed your Uncle Richard’s house warming party. So you ask your parents two questions about it.</br>Questions 3~4  Suppose you are new in Shanghai, and you’re going to the Shanghai Museum. Ask a stranger two questions for help.
Questions 1~2  You have missed your Uncle Richard’s house warming party. So you ask your parents two questions about it.
Questions 3~4  Suppose you are new in Shanghai, and you’re going to the Shanghai Museum. Ask a stranger two questions for help.
